list_all.happy: We're sooooo happy to see you !

login.new_user: Welcome {{ username }} ! You don't have anything in your list yet, you'll need to add some Pokemons you already have and those you wish you had. Afterwards, you can check if you didn't forget anything in your lists behind your awesome face in the top right.
login.too_short: Your username must be at least 3 characters

my_list.no_item: You don't have anything in your list yet. You can search for a Pokemon to add  at the bottom of the page.
my_list.title: My list

not_found.message: We couldn't find what you're looking for

pokemon_buttons.add_wish_list: Add Pokemon to my wish list
pokemon_buttons.unwish: Delete Pokemon from my wish list

search.info: First, we'll look if you have any stored or recently seen Pokemons that match your search in their name. If not, we'll call the server to know if it exists any Pokemon with the exact name you filled
search.really_only_letters: (no number, no space, no special characters, no accent, ... Stop being creative)
search.too_short: Minimal length is 3, you're almost there

wish_list.no_item: You don't have anything in your wish list yet. You can search for a Pokemon to add at the bottom of the page.
wish_list.title: My wish list
